verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I'm trading my sorrow newline I'm trading my shame newline I'm laying them down for the joy of the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I'm trading my sickness newline I'm trading my pain newline I'm laying them down for the joy of the Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: We say: newline Yes Lord (repeat) newline Amen

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I am pressed but not crushed newline Persecuted not abandoned newline Struck down but not destroyed newline I am blessed beyond the curse newline For His promise will endure newline And His joy's gonna be my strength

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Though the sorrow may last for the night newline His joy comes with the morning
